page.title: 13 A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: The alarm rings at 7.30 and I get out of bed and get dressed after which I eat my breakfast.At about 8.30 I leave for school and arrive about 10 minutes later when the bell rings everyone goes through one of the 3 main doors to enter the school.After this we all register and lead off for our first lesson in my case chemistry.This lesson is the same as usual,that is very little work.After this comes break which passes without incident.When the bell rings we walk to physics.This lesson is quite hard but is alright. At lunch I get an ice-cream. In the afternoon I go to registration followed by French, not one of my favourite lessons.Next comes geography. On any day there are 8 lessons, a break of 15 minutes and an hour lunch break.
